thread.title: 2017 Independent Spirit Award Winners: Complete List | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: 2017 Independent Spirit Award Winners: Complete List | Hollywood Reporter

title: 2017 Independent Spirit Award Winners: Complete List | Hollywood Reporter
text:
Sign up for our Newsletters . Daily Edition Spirit Awards: The Winners List (Updating Live) 1:53 PM 2/25/2017 by Kimberly Nordyke The awards are being handed out Saturday on a tent in the beach in Santa Monica. From left: 'Moonlight,''American Honey' and 'Manchester by the Sea' 
Film Independent is handing out the 2017 Spirit Awards on Saturday afternoon. 
American Honey and Moonlight leads with six nominations, followed by Manchester by the Sea with five. Moonlight also will receive the Robert Altman Award at the ceremony, hosted by John Mulaney and Nick Kroll. 
The 32nd Film Independent Spirit Awards will air live on IFC on Saturday, Feb. 25, at 2 p.m. PT/5 p.m. ET. As usual, the show will be held in a tent on the beach in Santa Monica, just north of the Santa Monica Pier. 
Keep up with the latest winners below. Best Feature
